name: Graviswitch
description:
Take control of 0rbit, a friendly little bot who can control gravity!

A short, one level experience about floating around a test chamber, avoiding spikes and collecting keys!

This is my entry for Mashup Game Jam 2021, as well as my first game ever developed.

This game follows the theme Unusual Means by allowing the player to take control of gravity instead of the player character to move around the testing chamber. The game also features restricted gravity zones with traditional platformer controls.

[Music was composed in Bosca Ceol]

[Art made in Photoshop]

[Game Developed in Godot]

[Sound Effects made in ChipTone]
